chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok p d -> prec_list_ref_ok_check p d = true

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
prec_list_ref_ok_check = fix prec_list_ref_ok_check (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) {struct p} : bool := match p with | prec_cons a la ls => addr_in_dta_check d a && (prec_list_ref_ok_check la d && prec_list_ref_ok_check ls d) | prec_empty => true end : prec_list -> preDTA -> bool
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
preDTA = Map state : Set
prec_list_ref_ok = fun (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) => forall a : ad, prec_occur p a -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s : prec_list -> preDTA -> Prop
prec_list_ref_ok_destr : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (d : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok (prec_cons a la ls) d -> prec_list_ref_ok la d /\ prec_list_ref_ok ls d
state_ref_ok = fun (s : state) (d : preDTA) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> prec_list_ref_ok p d : state -> preDTA -> Prop
state_ref_ok_M2_destr : forall (s0 s1 : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok (M2 prec_list s0 s1) d -> state_ref_ok s0 d /\ state_ref_ok s1 d
prec_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (a c : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
DTA_rec : forall P : DTA -> Set, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_ind : forall P : DTA -> Prop, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
DTA_ref_ok = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end : DTA -> Prop
Inductive prec_contained : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop := prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p | prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1) | prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
prec_contained_ind : forall P : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop, (forall p : prec_list, P p p) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> P p p1 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> forall p p0 : prec_list, prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0
prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
Pos.eqb_eq : forall p q : positive, (p =? q)%positive = true < -> p = q
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
prec_in_state = fun (s : state) (p : prec_list) => exists c : ad, MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : state -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_list_rec : forall P : prec_list -> Set, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_ind : forall P : prec_list -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_rect : forall P : prec_list -> Type, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
preDTA_ref_ok_def : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d < -> (forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d)
Pos.ltb_lt : forall p q : positive, (p <? q)%positive = true < -> (p < q)%positive
prec_in_state_M0_false : forall p : prec_list, ~ prec_in_state (M0 prec_list) p
state_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) => exists a : ad, MapGet state d a = Some s : preDTA -> state -> Prop
preDTA_ref_ok_distinct_dest : forall d0 d1 d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok_distinct (M2 state d0 d1) d -> preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d0 d /\ preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d1 d
preDTA_ref_ok_distinct = fun d d' : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d' : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
addr_in_dta_check = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => match MapGet state d a with | Some _ => true | None => false end : preDTA -> ad -> bool
state_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) (a : ad) => exists b : ad, MapGet state d b = Some s /\ a <> b : preDTA -> state -> ad -> Prop
Zbool.Zle_bool_plus_mono : forall n m p q : Z, BinInt.Z.leb n m = true -> BinInt.Z.leb p q = true -> BinInt.Z.leb (BinInt.Z.add n p) (BinInt.Z.add m q) = true
prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p
prec_occur_ind : forall P : prec_list -> ad -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a) -> (forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> P pl0 b -> P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b) -> (forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> P pl1 b -> P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b) -> forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur p a -> P p a
DTA_taille = fix DTA_taille (d : preDTA) : nat := match d with | @M0 _ => 0 | @M1 _ _ y => taille_1 y | @M2 _ x y => PeanoNat.Nat.max (DTA_taille x) (DTA_taille y) end : preDTA -> nat
BinInt.Z.add_le_mono : forall n m p q : Z, BinInt.Z.le n m -> BinInt.Z.le p q -> BinInt.Z.le (BinInt.Z.add n p) (BinInt.Z.add m q)
N_ind : forall P : N -> Prop, P 0%N -> (forall p : positive, P (N.pos p)) -> forall n : N, P n
BinNatDef.N.testbit = fun a n : N => match a with | 0%N => false | N.pos p => Pos.testbit p n end : N -> N -> bool Argument scopes are [N_scope N_scope]
Nless = fun a a' : N => match N.lxor a a' with | 0%N => false | N.pos p => Nless_aux a a' p end : N -> N -> bool Argument scopes are [N_scope N_scope]
BinIntDef.Z.pow = fun x y : Z => match y with | Z0 => Zpos 1 | Zpos p => BinIntDef.Z.pow_pos x p | Zneg _ => Z0 end : Z -> Z -> Z Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
Zerob.zerob_true_intro : forall n : nat, n = 0 -> Zerob.zerob n = true
QArith_base.Qeq = fun p q : QArith_base.Q => BinInt.Z.mul (QArith_base.Qnum p) (Zpos (QArith_base.Qden q)) = BinInt.Z.mul (QArith_base.Qnum q) (Zpos (QArith_base.Qden p)) : QArith_base.Q -> QArith_base.Q -> Prop Argument scopes are [Q_scope Q_scope]

```intros p d H. induction H.
+ simpl. reflexivity.
+ simpl. rewrite IHprec_list_ref_ok1, IHprec_list_ref_ok2. reflexivity.```

original: intros p d H. induction H. + simpl. reflexivity. + simpl. rewrite IHprec_list_ref_ok1, IHprec_list_ref_ok2. reflexivity.
